name: Destiny: The Archive
description:
Welcome to the archive. This is a mini project for Destiny fans, and has been specifically made in a 5 day period for release on Bungie Day 2020. There may be a few bugs, but I hope you enjoy wandering through this Destiny museum and reflect on some of the classic experiences Destiny has brought over the years.

Thank you to TeaWrex, Datto, King Gothalion, MyNameisByf, and all the people included for their contributions of audio or their hard modeling work.

And thank you to Bungie for making an awesome game!
